metadata.synopsis: Morning after Karlach's romance in act 2

15.speaker: Karlach
15.text: Mmm... la da da... bum ba du-dumdum...
15.context: NodeContext: Slightly starled/ awkward. She's super happy here but it's been so long since she's felt like this, she's a bit out of her element.

4.speaker: Player
4.context: NodeContext: Slightly starled/ awkward. She's super happy here but it's been so long since she's felt like this, she's a bit out of her element.

18.speaker: Karlach
18.text: Oh! Gods, sorry, I was in my own world. Hi. Hello, good morning.
18.context: NodeContext: Slightly starled/ awkward. She's super happy here but it's been so long since she's felt like this, she's a bit out of her element.

46.speaker: Karlach
46.text: Sorry I didn't wait around this morning. I was just... just buzzing. Didn't want to wake you.
46.context: NodeContext: She's totally in love and energised.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: Did you sleep well last night?

26.speaker: Karlach
26.text: Like the dead. The excruciatingly happy dead.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: I loved being able to touch you last night. Hold you, kiss you, all of it.
11.context: NodeContext: Subtext: 'More than I've ever loved anyONE.' She and the player will exchange 'I love yous' soon enough, but not quite yet It's probably on both of their minds though.

22.speaker: Karlach
22.text: I loved it too. More than I've ever loved anything.
22.context: NodeContext: Subtext: 'More than I've ever loved anyONE.' She and the player will exchange 'I love yous' soon enough, but not quite yet It's probably on both of their minds though.

9.speaker: Player
9.context: NodeContext: Laughing at herself a little.

5.speaker: Karlach
5.text: Still. You looked so peaceful. I wanted to go wherever you were. But I'm me, so I did a lap of camp instead.
5.context: NodeContext: Laughing at herself a little.

2.speaker: Karlach
2.text: Last night was incredible. This morning is incredible. Every moment with you is... beyond belief.

34.speaker: Karlach
34.context: NodeContext: Suddenly doubting, realizing this is all so good it might get taken away at any moment.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: Of course I do. Never doubt it.
31.context: NodeContext: Delighted she gets to hang out with the player all day.

0.speaker: Karlach
0.text: And... and nothing bad is going to happen now?
0.context: NodeContext: Delighted she gets to hang out with the player all day.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: If our record is anything to go by, there are plenty of disasters in our future. But we'll face them together.
27.context: NodeContext: Delighted she gets to hang out with the player all day.

33.speaker: Karlach
33.text: In that case, bring it on.
33.context: NodeContext: Delighted she gets to hang out with the player all day.

21.speaker: Karlach
21.context: NodeContext: Delighted she gets to hang out with the player all day.

51.speaker: Player
51.context: NodeContext: Delighted she gets to hang out with the player all day.

3.speaker: Karlach
3.context: NodeContext: Delighted she gets to hang out with the player all day.

39.speaker: Karlach
39.text: I guess we'd better get the day on. So much to do, so much to see... together! Wheyyy.
39.context: NodeContext: Delighted she gets to hang out with the player all day.

24.speaker: Player
24.context: NodeContext: So excited, then covers her mouth with her hand sheepishly/ chuckling. (This is to highlight the sweet youthfulness behind the tough cool charisma machine

48.speaker: Karlach
48.text: I LOVE YOU TOO! Oh my gods, I've been dying to say that.
48.context: NodeContext: So excited, then covers her mouth with her hand sheepishly/ chuckling. (This is to highlight the sweet youthfulness behind the tough cool charisma machine

12.speaker: Karlach
12.text: My gods, if I smile any bigger my face is going to crack. I'm pathetic. Besotted! And it's all your fault.

1.speaker: Player
1.context: NodeContext: A little sceptical. She just said she adores the player and they responded 'thank you'.

20.speaker: Karlach
20.context: NodeContext: A little sceptical. She just said she adores the player and they responded 'thank you'.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: I think you know better than that.

47.speaker: Karlach
47.text: I do. But sometimes I don't mind being lied to.

41.speaker: Karlach
41.text: But you're not the gilding type. Straightforward, true as the day is long.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: No, nothing bad is going to happen to us ever again.

35.text: A beautiful lie. But I guess whatever comes, we'll be there. Together. That's enough for me.

43.speaker: Karlach
43.text: A beautiful lie. But I guess whatever comes, we'll be there. Together. That's enough for me.

30.speaker: Player
30.context: NodeContext: With sweet gravitas. Very meaningful for her to be able to say this.

50.speaker: Karlach
50.text: I much more than like you too.
50.context: NodeContext: With sweet gravitas. Very meaningful for her to be able to say this.

42.speaker: Player
42.context: NodeContext: Karlach asked if the player still likes her and the player responded 'About that.' Karlach laughs at first but then is terrified they're serious.

7.speaker: Karlach
7.context: NodeContext: Karlach asked if the player still likes her and the player responded 'About that.' Karlach laughs at first but then is terrified they're serious.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: No, I'm sorry - it was just a joke. Of course I still like you.
8.context: NodeContext: Player is breaking up with her after their night together. She did NOT see this coming. This should be from a real crack in the heart.

45.speaker: Karlach
45.text: My gods, I think my heart almost stopped completely. Don't scare me like that, you scallywag!

10.speaker: Karlach
10.text: Nothing bad is going to happen now. Not now that we're finally so... so close. Right?

6.speaker: Player
6.text: I'm sorry, Karlach, but I think... I think last night was a mistake.
6.context: NodeContext: Player is breaking up with her after their night together. She did NOT see this coming. This should be from a real crack in the heart.

25.speaker: Karlach
25.context: NodeContext: Player is breaking up with her after their night together. She did NOT see this coming. This should be from a real crack in the heart.

17.speaker: Player
17.context: NodeContext: Goes from heartbreak to justified fury very quickly if the player breaks up with her after their night together.

38.speaker: Karlach
38.text: All right. Well fuck you too then. Using me like I'm a fucking grenade in your pack. Well, you did your damage. Are you happy?
38.context: NodeContext: Goes from heartbreak to justified fury very quickly if the player breaks up with her after their night together.

14.speaker: Karlach
14.text: Get out of my face. Wanker.
14.context: NodeContext: Goes from heartbreak to justified fury very quickly if the player breaks up with her after their night together.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: No, no, I'm sorry. I was only messing around.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: Well, I don't just 'like' you. I much more than like you.

16.speaker: Player
16.text: Last night I dreamt a bird was singing to me. And look, there she is.
16.context: NodeContext: Looking around, humming to herself, not staring at the player

49.speaker: Player
49.context: NodeContext: Looking around, humming to herself, not staring at the player

23.speaker: Karlach
23.context: NodeContext: Looking around, humming to herself, not staring at the player
